Room.Name: Darmanian Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Darmanian Way, north of the Cathedral of Worldly Bliss.
Room.LongDescription: The Cathedral of Worldly Bliss is perhaps one of the most powerful factors in religious control in Oceancrest. Much of the common law is dictated by the church, and the Cathedral forms much of that opinion. The final authority comes from Lyanden Castle.
